story.text: In principle there's nothing stopping anyone from advertising in the fediverse, but ads tend not to be favored and because this is not a centralized system the potential viewership of any advert is likely to be quite limited.
It may also be hard for advertisers to target people in the same way that they do via the centralized systems.
You might see people calling for support for campaigns or crowdfunding, but so far any formal or generic advertising is exceptionally rare.
